bridge-type.label: Owl Bridge
bridge-type.description: The Network OWL is a bridge to OWL Intuition devices.

parameter.name: ipAddress
parameter.label: Network Address
parameter.description: Network address of the Network OWL

parameter.name: udpPort
parameter.label: Port
parameter.description: Port of the UDP control channel

parameter.name: udpKey
parameter.label: UDP key
parameter.description: Each Network OWL has its own UDP key, which can be requested from The OWL Customer services department. This key is required to send control messages to the Network OWL. If key is not provided no control messages will be accepted.

parameter.name: mcastGroup
parameter.label: Multicast Group
parameter.description: IP address of the multicast group

parameter.name: pollingInterval
parameter.label: Polling Interval
parameter.description: Seconds between fetching values from the bridge. Default is 60.
